dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringements - Repost and Appeal for URGENT INTERVENTION]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, July 14, 2005 5:02 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; admin@beautymag.net
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringements - Repost and Appeal for
URGENT INTERVENTION]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Copyright Infringements - Repost and Appeal for
URGENT
INTERVENTION
Date:         Wed, 13 Jul 2005 20:18:34 +0200
From:         Boris Senker <admin@beautymag.net>
To:         abuse@theplanet.com
CC:         abuse@forumer.com



Hi,

sending you abuse report again. After our initial report to you, one of the
authors of our magazine posted a few messages on that forum that steals our
materials about 'Please take our articles down' and 'shame on you' etc.

The owner refuses to take our materials off her site, now she has even
opened a thread in her forum titled 'BeautyMag cooperatives post
here'!!!!!!!! This is outrageous and has to be stopped!

Since we strongly feel that this person is making fun of our reputable
magazine and damaging us and copyrighted authors, please be kind and *force
the removal of this site and all our materials on it*.

Please help us protect our materials and copyrights.


Thanks,

Boris Senker
BeautyMag Administrator


Previous message:

- -----------------------------------------------------

/Hi,

we have noticed that one of the free forum members on *Forumer.com* (this
free forum's URL is http://kuharica.12.forumer.com/index.php ) is *stealing
our complete articles from our magazine* www.beautymag.net
<http://www.beautymag.net/> *and hotlinks many images*.

We have asked this free forum owner to remove them immediately by two
private messages on her forum (couldn't mail her through her forum getting
smtp.php error) in Croatian language she also uses as we do. She r*udely
denied* by replying 'What can you do this is a free forum' and banned the
user we registered from her forum.

Then we sent two abuse complaints to Forumer.com abuse via their contact
form:

-
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
/

    /Stolen materials and hotlinked images from our site /
    /Hi, /
    /this is a second appeal for you to intervene. There is one of your
    free forum owners at:

    /
    / http://kuharica.12.forumer.com/index.php

    /
    /that literally steals our articles from our website and republishes
    them unchanged on her forum. She even hotlinks our images. This
    person refused our demands to take the articles she stole from us
    down. /
    /Our articles are protected by copyright law and we do have the
    right to ask site owners to take them down. /
    /This person has no content on her forum but the articles she is
    stealing from us. Our website is publishing original articles that
    authors write for us and our magazine is registered with an ISSN
    number. On our site we specifically prohibit article reproduction
    without a written consent. Which she didn't get from us and never
    will. /
    /Please be kind and enforce our copyrights by forcing this person to
    take our articles down and stops stealing them and hotlinking images. /
    /Thanks in advance, /
    /Boris Senker /
    /BeautyMag.net /

/---------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----

No reply and no actions were performed from them.

The articles are in Croatian, but just by looking at the images
(hotlinked) and the texts and titles you will be able to see that our
materials are republished LITERALLY.

Some of the stolen articles with corresponding articles on our site:

/

    / http://kuharica.12.forumer.com/viewtopic.php?t=189 /
    / http://www.beautymag.net/uredjenje_prostora/dizajn_interijera


    /

    / http://www.beautymag.net/uredjenje_prostora/oblikovanje_prostora


    /

    /

    / http://www.beautymag.net/uredjenje_prostora/dizajn_u_sluzbi


    /

    /

http://www.beautymag.net/uredjenje_prostora/terapeutski_okolis-unutarnje_ure
djenje_zdravstvenih_ustanova


    /
    / http://kuharica.12.forumer.com/viewtopic.php?t=183 /
    /

http://www.beautymag.net/uredjenje_prostora/uredjenje_kuhinja_u_restoranima

    <http://www.beautymag.net/%A0%A0%A0%A0%A0%A0> (our poll, front page,
    right column)

http://www.beautymag.net/prehrana/hrana/meso_i_riba/savjeti_za_pripremu_ribe

    http://www.beautymag.net/fitness/vrste_vjezbi/motocross_prvenstvo_2005 /

ntrima

http://www.beautymag.net/prehrana/dijete/regulacija_tjelesne_tezine_izracuna

http://www.beautymag.net/prehrana/dijete/regulacija_tjelesne_tezine_utvrdiva

http://www.beautymag.net/prehrana/dijete/regulacija_tjelesne_tezine_omjer_nu
trijenata_i_raspored_obroka


    /

/You can clearly see the extent of it. Our authors are very angry seeing
this. On our site we have clearly stated that no materials are to be
reproduced without prior written consent from us.

Please be kind and help us exercise and enforce our copyrights, protecting
our magazine and our author's works.

Sincerely,

Boris Senker
BeautyMag.net Administrator and co-owner of Dvotocka (www.dvotocka.hr
<http://www.dvotocka.hr/>), company owning this magazine and the server it
is hosted on

/

- --------------------------------------------------------------->
BeautyMag.net
online magazin


- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
